channel.title: Xp Rate
channel.description:
This is a Basic 317 based on [b]Deltascape[/b]. I believe thats all you need to know to be able to help me.
Now my problem is changing xp rate. Where do I find the xp rate stuff so i can change it? i wna make it better to slow. Also on the Mage book how do i make the Varrock tele and stuff change to like teleport me to pest control and all that? Help will be rewarded

item.title: Xp Rate
item.dc:creator: @bigbaddrag bigbaddrag
item.description:
@bigbaddrag wrote:

I know how to change the magebook tele locations.

open the clickingmost class (clickingmost.java)

find the coordinates that the spell teleports you to, and search for just one of them, either the x or y coord.
you should get something like this

c.triggerTele(2957+misc.random(2),3212+misc.random(2), 0);

where 2957 is the x coord, and 3212 is the y coord (rimmington). also, the numbers in parentheses determines how many spaces away from the exact coordinate you may tele from, in this case, you may tele to a place up to 2 spaces away from the main coordinate

change those coordinates to the coordinates you want the spell to tele you to, save, and compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Xp Rate
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

If you know the xp rate then just simply search for those integers in the client class (client.java).

A better alternative would be to try and look at the methods that involve attacking players/NPCs. Perhaps attackNPC()/attackPlayer()? Look for it around.

Read full topic
